thread.title: Armed robbers hold up New Orleans barber shop
thread.title_full: Armed robbers hold up New Orleans barber shop - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Sam Winstrom, Assignment Editor
title: Armed robbers hold up New Orleans barber shop
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - Several people were robbed at a barber shop on Claiborne Avenue Saturday night.
According to a preliminary report from NOPD, two armed subjects entered the Innovative Barber Shop in the 3700 block of S. Claiborne Avenue around 11:30 p.m. The two armed subjects ordered everyone to get on the ground and then cleared out their pockets before fleeing the scene.
Anyone with information on this incident is asked to call CRIMESTOPPERS at 504-822-1111.
